Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery storage-vessel, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, now smudged, identifying the contents as meat of year 12.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393411) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393411)
